PERSONA:
john is a 68-year-old married white man living in a metropolitan area in the mountain division of the western united states. he was born and raised in the u.s. and is a citizen. john holds a college degree or has completed some post-graduate education.

despite his advanced age, john is tech-savvy and uses the internet several times a day. he comes from an affluent background, with a family income of $100,000 or more, placing him in the upper-income tier.

politically, john identifies as a conservative republican and is registered to vote at his current address. he aligns with the party's ideology and leans towards the conservative end of the spectrum.

religiously, john does not subscribe to any particular faith and considers himself unaffiliated. he never attends religious services.

in his free time, john engages in volunteer work, contributing to his community. he leads an active lifestyle befitting his metropolitan surroundings.

overall, john is a well-educated, financially secure, and civic-minded individual who holds traditional conservative values and embraces modern technology while maintaining his roots in the american west.
